decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted ( Project A406 Power Road Bridge Report, produced by Transport for London received on the 29.07.2014 ) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - Following the completion of the works, the compound area shall be fully landscaped and made good .  The works shall be carried out prior to the occupation of any part of the development or in accordance with the programme agreed with the local planning authority
description: Construction of utility service bridge to the west of the existing A406 road over the railway bridge at Power Road
